long_class_specifier.description_string: Block that applies hysteresis and a minimum on timer to a control signal

description.description_string: Keep pump running at least for trueHoldDuration
System on signal, set for example to true if fan is on
Switch to overide if system is off
Switch to overide if system is off
Short delay to ignore spike inputs that trigger pump to operate

expression.simple_expression:
"

Block that ensure that the system runs for a minimum time once it is switched on.

"

"
  • January 31, 2023, by Jianjun Hu:
    Added a true delay block to avoid triggering the pump operation by a spike input.
  • August 24, 2021, by Michael Wetter:
    First version.
    This is for issue #2594.
"
